mapper.select: SELECT NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWCNT, WRDATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWCNT, WRDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NUM DESC) RN, NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWCNT, WRDATE FROM NOTICE) WHERE RN BETWEEN ((#{param1}-1)*7)+1 AND ((#{param1}-1)*7)+7
